50990.summary: Some customers in the Dilworth area of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
50990.title: June 26 - Kelowna (Dilworth ) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
